snippet: Richard Bradford’s biography is a mostly reliable guide through Martin Amis’s best novels, but lacks an instinctive feeling for their author.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Martin Amis: The Biography by Richard Bradford.
lead_paragraph: Richard Bradford’s biography is a mostly reliable guide through Martin Amis’s best novels, but lacks an instinctive feeling for their author.

headline.seo: ‘Martin Amis: The Biography,’ by Richard Bradford
headline.main: The Life Of a Writer, Reviewed
